data.quote: No cricket team in the world depends on one or two players. The team always plays to win.
data.author: Virat Kohli

data.quote: Cricket is a team game. If you want fame for yourself, go play an individual game.
data.author: Gautam Gambhir

data.quote: Cricket is basically baseball on valium.
data.author: Robin Williams

data.quote: The era of playing aggressive cricket and to have the mid-on up is gone. You now try to read the mindset of a batsman.
data.author: MSD

data.quote: A cricket ground is a flat piece of earth with some buildings around it.
data.author: Richie Benaud

data.quote: It cricket requires one to assume such indecent postures.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: The Test cricket we've played over the last few weeks has been of a very high standard.
data.author: Ricky Ponting

data.quote: Cricket to us was more than play, It was a worship in the summer sun.
data.author: Edmund Blunden

data.quote: Cricket is an international game which is played by a diverse range of cultures and communities. Respect for each other is a key component of the game and racist comments have no place in cricket.
data.author: Malcolm Speed

data.quote: Cricket is about a lot more than playing by the rules, Mistry. It’s a gentleman’s game. Don’t you ever forget that.
data.author: Ken Doyle

data.quote: A good cricketer never loses his nerve. He just bats on!
data.author: Anthony T. Hincks

data.quote: In cricket, you have a sense of sport as it should be played by people who respect each other. They fought fiercely but they were friends.
data.author: Peter Kellne

data.quote: Cricket is full of theorists who can ruin your game in no time.
data.author: Ian Botham

data.quote: One-day cricket is an exhibition. Test cricket is an examination.
data.author: Henry Blofeld

data.quote: Cricket now is definitely a professional sport.
data.author: Glenn McGrath

data.quote: Cricket is battle and service and sport and art
data.author: Douglas Jardine

data.quote: One day cricket is like fast food. No one wants to cook.
data.author: Viv Richards

data.quote: Cricket is not illegal, for it is a manly game.
data.author: Queen Anne

data.quote: Cricket more than any other game is inclined towards sentimentalism and cant.
data.author: Neville Cardus

data.quote: Cricket is a pressure game, and when it comes to an India-Pakistan match the pressure is doubled.
data.author: Imran Khan
